title: BAN BAN BAN;]
body: ok i m banned for using bol scripts . does it means permanntly its 4ever? there is no tribunal for scripters?

replies.body: my friend is using teemooflegends.com for 2 years i m using 2 months and he still is using without beeing banned.wtf? riot why me why not other where is justice ,,,,, well i made mistake... but i dont know where

> [{quoted}](name=DUDE FROM LTU,realm=EUW,application-id=MJVj50Jw,discussion-id=xyJnuVA6,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-05-01T09:36:16.591+0000)
>
> my friend is using botoflegends.com for 2 years i m using 2 months and he still is using without beeing banned.wtf? riot why me why not other where is justice ,,,,, well i made mistake... but i dont know where

It's quite simple: **you break the rules, you get punished**. Don't worry about your friend: sooner or later he will be punished too.

BTW this is the italian forum, so, if you want, you can write in italian.
Give us , y friend name!!! and justice will be done!!! ;) {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
No there is no tribunal for scripters. If you want you can send a ticket to support but they will not lift your ban.
